---
#### Metadata
title: Title
short: Short title for headings
journal: "AER" # AER, AEJ, PP, JEL
month: 
year: 
vol: 
issue: 
jel: 
keywords: 
issueName: 
author: 
  - name: author1
    firstname: name1
    surname: surname1
    email: email1
    affiliation: institution1
  - name: author2
    firstname: name2
    surname: surname2
    email: email2
    affiliation: institution2
abstract: |
  `r paste(readLines("_abstract.Rmd"), collapse = '\n  ')`
acknowledgements:
draft: true # set formatting to draft mode (linespace to 1.5)?

#### Global parameters
params:
  corrections: false # set false to stop applying blue background to blocks of corrections
  decimal_digits: 3 # set number of decimal digits to use in printing output

#### Bibliography options
bibliography: references/biblio.bib
biblio-style: chicago-authordate
biblatexoptions:
  - backend = biber
  - related = false
  - sorting = nyt
  - includeall = false
  - giveninits = true
  - uniquename = mininit

#### Output options
output:
  bookdown::pdf_book:
    template: templates/template.tex
    latex_engine: pdflatex
    keep_tex: true
    citation_package: biblatex
    extra_dependencies:
      hyperref: ['colorlinks = true', 'allcolors = blue', 'linktoc = true', 'bookmarksdepth = 3']
      caption: ['format = hang', 'labelfont = bf', 'textfont = bf']
      amsmath: null
      amssymb: null
      dsfont: null
      graphicx: null
      subcaption: null
      ragged2e: null
      floatrow: null
    includes:
      before_body: 'templates/preamble.tex'
    pandoc_args: ['--top-level-division=section', '--lua-filter=bookdown/scripts_and_filters/correction_filter.lua']
  bookdown::gitbook:
    css: templates/style.css
    config:
      sharing:
        facebook: false
        twitter: yes
        all: false
  bookdown::word_document2:
    toc: true   
link-citations: true
documentclass: article

---

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(haven)
library(kableExtra)
library(labelled)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(forcats)
library(MetricsWeighted)
library(cluster)
library(srvyr)
library(survey)
library(stargazer)

# Set the theme
my_theme <- theme_light() +
  theme(panel.border = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(colour = 'black'),
        panel.grid = element_line(colour = '#d9e6eb', linetype = 2), # Stata's bluishgray
        strip.background = element_blank(),
        strip.text = element_text(colour = 'black'),
        legend.position = 'bottom')
theme_set(my_theme)  

# Set palette
palette_blindsafe <- c('#77AADD', '#EE8866', '#DDAA33', '#FFAABB', '#99DDFF', '#44BB99', '#BBCC33', '#AAAA00', '#DDDDDD')

scale_colour_discrete <- function(...) scale_colour_manual(..., values = palette_blindsafe)
scale_fill_discrete <- function(...) scale_fill_manual(... , values = palette_blindsafe)
```
